qas.question: What is the smallest airport in the London area?
London City Airport's clients are comprised chiefly of what?
Which local UK airport hub is located in Essex?
London Southend Airport in Essex offers primarily what type of service?
Where is London City Airport located?

context: <a2_0>Stansted Airport<a2_0/>, north east of London in Essex, is a local UK hub and Luton Airport to the north of London in Bedfordshire, caters mostly for cheap short-haul flights. <a0_0>London City Airport<a0_0/>, the smallest and most central airport, in <a4_0>Newham, East London<a4_0/>, is focused on <a1_0>business travellers<a1_0/>, with a mixture of full service short-haul scheduled flights and considerable business jet traffic. London Southend Airport, east of London in Essex, is a smaller, regional airport that mainly caters for <a3_0>cheap short-haul flights<a3_0/>.
